title: Types of Machine Learning
subject: Data Science
theory:
1. **Supervised**: Labeled data. (Regression, Classification).
2. **Unsupervised**: No labels. (Clustering, PCA).
3. **Reinforcement**: Agent learns via rewards/penalties.

examples.explanation:
Supervised: Predicting House Price (Price is known in history).
Unsupervised: Customer Segmentation (No pre-defined segments).

real_world_use_cases.description: Reinforcement Learning agent that beat the world champion at Go.

summary: The type of data you have dictates the type of ML you can use.
